alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued March 30 at 7:52PM MDT until March 31 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT FRIDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter to one half mile in dense fog. For the High Wind Watch, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 9 AM MDT Friday. For the High Wind Watch, from Saturday evening through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera
